title: Immediate hypnotic induction in the lift/ Dr. Paret
description:
Intense hypnotic induction in the lift with Dr Paret. The hypnosis in the lift is very deep and extremely intense. Dr. Paret shows that Non-Verbal hypnosis can be performed anywhere.

Dr. Marco Paret is the world's leading authority in Non-Verbal Hypnotism.
